steps.heading: Developing with Composer
steps.content:
The Composition Service offers a new programming model for building cloud-native applications by **composing cloud functions and services**. This guide introduces you to the developer experience.

When programming compositions, the tooling runs entirely on your laptop. As you execute commands, you will have access to your local filesystem and your favorite terminal and text editor. To help with understanding complex data, the tool offers a suite of **visualizations**.

learnMore.doc: All of the CRUD, and many of the view commands, are accessible **directly from your favorite terminal**. You can gracefully flip between the terminal and these visualizations, without having to switch to your browser, log in, wait for pages to load, and so on.
